definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]

sentences.english: Might UAVs eventually replace manned combat aircraft altogether?
sentences.chinese: 那么无人机是否可能完全替代人工驾驶的战斗机？
喷气式战斗机在空中侦察巡逻。

sentences.english: In the Empire, a standard Dreadnaught carried a squadron of TIE fighters.
sentences.chinese: 在帝国，一艘标准的无畏级携带一个中队的钛战斗机。

sentences.english: The fighter also carried an astromech droid for onboard repairs.
sentences.chinese: 战斗机上也有宇航技工机器人负责机载维修。

sentences.english: Many of his world-mates also served as Alliance starfighter pilots in the battle.
sentences.chinese: 他的许多同胞也在战斗中担任同盟星际战斗机飞行员。

sentences.english: The fighter plane will be flight- tested nest month.
sentences.chinese: 新战斗机将于下月试飞。

sentences.english: The pilot of the fighter plane even declares a near-collision.
sentences.chinese: 战斗机的飞行员甚至还宣称跟它有近距离碰触。

sentences.english: As a self-respecting fighter pilot , that's all I'll say on that subject.
sentences.chinese: 作为一名有自尊的战斗机飞行员，我要说的就这么多。

sentences.english: Reports from gunnery officers were more enthusiastic than those of Fighter Command.
sentences.chinese: 来自枪炮长的报告要比战斗机飞行员的热情的多。

sentences.english: Create this awesome looking spitfire in this Modeling and Texturing tutorial.
sentences.chinese: 本教程将为创建好的野火式战斗机的贴图。

sentences.english: The deal did not include new and more advanced F-16 fighter jets, although U.
sentences.chinese: 该协议并不包括购买更多新的F16战斗机。

sentences.english: All the fighters landed safely on the airport after the military maneuver.
sentences.chinese: 在军事演习后，所有战斗机都安全降落在机场上。

sentences.english: Adventurous Annie grows up to become a navy fighter pilot.
sentences.chinese: 酷爱冒险的她长大后成为了一名海军战斗机飞行员。

sentences.english: Doctors said there had been no sign of Nato warplanes over the city.
sentences.chinese: 医生称，该城市上空没有出现北约战斗机的痕迹。

sentences.english: Nowadays DLC technique is widely used in the design of the third generation combat aircraft and airbus.
sentences.chinese: 目前它被广泛的应用于第三代战斗机和大型民机上。

sentences.english: In 1985, Israel sent fighter planes to kill arafat.
sentences.chinese: 1985年以色列曾派战斗机袭击阿拉法特。

definition: opportunity in a battle/fighter aircraft/war secret
early warning aircraft system, e.g. US AWACS
